name: ClearCrystal
description:
ClearCrystal

Gather resources, construct defenses, and defend the crystal. Your duty is to protect the crystal from monsters that attack the crystal to satisfy their greed.

ClearCrystal is a tower defense survival game where you defend the crystal from monsters by constructing towers that shoot them. The difficulty gets harder every night so you must stay vigilant

Disclaimer: The game is currently in beta.So bugs are expected. I also plan to add more features to ClearCrystal. Thank you for understanding. Disclaimer 2: The game only works for monitors that has a ratio of 16:9. Other ratio might mess up the UI ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
